title: FAQ
intro: Quick answers to common questions about accounts, orders, payments, and shipping.

items.q: How do I create an account?
items.a: Go to Sign up, enter your details, confirm your email, and accept the Terms. You can edit your profile later in Account settings.

items.q: How do I track my order?
items.a: Open your Orders in the profile. Each order shows status and items. Shipping updates are sent by the seller and appear in notifications.
We support major cards and wallets via our payment provider. Availability may vary by region.
Return eligibility depends on seller policy. Check the listing details. If eligible, start a return from the order details page.
Use the help center link below or open the support chat from your account. Include your order ID for faster help.

help.title: Need more help?
help.body: If your question isn’t listed here, contact support and we’ll respond as soon as possible.
